text: There was WinRPM, but all those systems are deprecated nowadays

elements.text: There was WinRPM, but all those systems are deprecated nowadays

text:
Okay!
I need help building an artifact and I think almost all its dependencies are there in Yggdrasil!
I just need to know, how to use them....
Basically how exactly does the artifact system work, and where do the jll files fit

If you've time, a bit of guidance is appreciated!

elements.text:

If you've time, a bit of guidance is appreciated!

text: If you’re just starting and don’t know how any of this works, maybe this video can help fill in some of the gaps:
